sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { User, ShoppingBag, Heart, MessageCircle, Settings, Star, MapPin, Phone, Mail, Eye, Calendar, Package, CreditCard, Award, Store, Plus } from 'lucide-react'; const UserProfile = () => { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('overview'); // Mock user data - in real app this would come from API/auth context const userData = { id: 'user_123', firstName: 'John', lastName: 'Doe', email: 'john.doe@example.com', phone: '+1 (555) 123-4567', avatar: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1472099645785-5658abf4ff4e?w=100&h=100&fit=crop&crop=face', location: { city: 'New York', state: 'NY', country: 'USA' }, accountType: 'buyer', // 'buyer' or 'seller' canSell: false, // true after upgrade stats: { totalPurchases: 12, totalSpent: 850, favoriteItems: 23, reviewsGiven: 8, rating: 4.6, // as a buyer reviewCount: 5 }, joinedDate: '2023-06-15', membershipLevel: 'Silver', // Bronze, Silver, Gold, Platinum isVerified: true }; // Simple tabs for buyers only const buyerTabConfig = [ { id: 'overview', label: 'Overview', icon: User }, { id: 'orders', label: 'Order History', icon: ShoppingBag }, { id: 'pending', label: 'Pending Orders', icon: Package }, { id: 'wishlist', label: 'Wishlist', icon: Heart }, { id: 'settings', label: 'Settings', icon: Settings } ]; const statsCards = [ { title: 'Total Orders', value: userData.stats.totalPurchases, icon: ShoppingBag, color: 'blue' }, { title: 'Total Spent', value: userData.stats.totalSpent, icon: CreditCard, color: 'green', prefix: '$' }, { title: 'Wishlist Items', value: userData.stats.favoriteItems, icon: Heart, color: 'red' }, { title: 'Reviews Given', value: userData.stats.reviewsGiven, icon: Star, color: 'yellow' } ]; const handleUpgradeToSeller = () => { // In real app, this would make API call to upgrade account // For now, redirect to simple seller dashboard window.location.href = '/sell/dashboard'; }; return (
